value.0: Get gone! I'll not tell you twice. The aqueducts isn't a place for civilians. But if you are trying to make a difference in Neverwinter, go see Sedos in the academy.
Who might you be, then? Speak up, speak up, I can't spend much time on pleasantries right now. Too much to do.

Comment.value: Do not advance the times talked to. Starts over if selected again.

Main plot of this area not done.

Player has not done any other plots yet

Set <CUSTOM42> as name of first person to select him

value.0: You're one of the new guards? Land and lord, why didn't you say so? Your job will be to run these "Sword Coast Boys" out of the docks!
We've been up to our necks with these brigands. Even deeper for short folk like me. The Docks is just a mess, it is.
They've never been this bad before the plague. I know they're being lead by a young bandit named Drawl. That sneaky little rat was always elusive... couldn't ever be captured.
Seems with the panic of the Wailing, they've bolstered their numbers and started killing everyone else who wouldn't join them. So now we want him and everyone of his gang dead!
Based on "interrogations" from some of their gang members, you should start by looking in the aqueducts. It's connected to the sewer system here in Neverwinter, which is where their hideout is.
Remember recruit, kill on sight. Bring some militia with you or a henchman from the Trade of Blades - you'll need it. Now get going!

Comment.value:
secondary.

main plot not yet done.

value.0: Well now, the details ain't my business, but you sure helped us! Cut the head off the snake you did. Here's your reward. Great work, recruit.

Comment.value:
Main plot is done. Gulnan heart may or may not have been turned into Aribeth

Player spoke to him previously

Player has completed at least one other quest.

value.0: As a matter of fact I do! There have been incidents of wererat attacks happening in the district. I suspect there is a leader amongst them, guiding their attacks. Enter the sewers, and eliminate the threat!
Suit yourself. I'm sure someone else will happily claim this bounty.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> You're not fooling anyone. You don't even stink of being in the sewers! I need you to bring me back some proof of the deed before I give you a reward.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Amazing. You're always the one to take care of business! Here's the gold. Goodbye!
Excellent. On your way, then!
Great work as always. Here's the gold as promised. Goodbye!
<FullName> is my name. I'm a recruit from the academy.

Comment.value: player has not been into the sword Coast boys or snake cult area yet. Has not spoken with Krestal or Jemanie

value.0: I'll be on my way, then.
Go over the basic run down of the situation.
Drawl is dead.
Farewell.
I was wondering if you had any work for me.
Sorry, I'm not interested in trekking through the sewers again.
<StartCheck>[Bluff]</Start> Actually, I have already killed the leader of the wererats.
Consider it done.
I have killed the leader of the wererats.
